app.defaultSeoTitle: Riobaldo: Platform for Philosophical and Algebraic Studies
app.defaultSeoDescription: Explore philosophy and algebra with Riobaldo, the comprehensive educational platform for high school students and educators.

banner.title: Get the official course for Nuxt 4 and save $50 with code NUXT4RDY

contextMenu.copiedDescription: You can now paste it into your project

gettingStarted.label: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to get started with Riobaldo to explore philosophical and algebraic concepts.

guide.label: Guide
guide.description: Get the key concepts, directory structure and best practices.

templates.label: Templates
templates.description: Start your next project with a Riobaldo template.

videoCourses.label: Video Courses
videoCourses.description: Learn Riobaldo by watching video courses.

showcase.description: Discover and explore projects built with Riobaldo.

uiPro.label: Riobaldo UI Pro
uiPro.description: Build faster with premium components for Vue or Riobaldo.

studio.description: Edit your Nuxt Content website with a visual editor.

hub.description: Deploy & manage full-stack Nuxt apps that scale.

designKit.title: Design Kit
designKit.description: Design resources for Riobaldo are on the way.
designKit.placeholder: We are preparing design resources for Riobaldo. Check back soon!

meta.title: Riobaldo - Philosophy and Mathematics
meta.description: Educational platform for studying philosophy and mathematics at high school level.

hero.description: Explore the complete works of Louis Lavelle and deepen your knowledge of philosophy and algebra. An educational platform designed for high school students and teachers.

featured.title: Featured Works
featured.description: Begin your exploration with these foundational texts from Louis Lavelle, fully transcribed and annotated.

bibliography.title: Louis Lavelle Bibliography
bibliography.description: Discover the chronological evolution of Louis Lavelle's philosophical work, from his early theses to posthumous publications.

availability.title: Publication progress
availability.description: {available} of {total} works are transcribed, {pending} still in progress.

features.title: Why Riobaldo?
features.description: A platform crafted to enrich the study of philosophy and mathematics.

education.title: Educational Resources
education.description: Full access to philosophical works and math exercises aligned with the high school curriculum.

originalTexts.title: Original Texts
originalTexts.description: Faithful transcriptions of Louis Lavelle's works with annotations and context.

structuredProgress.title: Structured Progress
structuredProgress.description: Progressive algebra learning paths with solved exercises and demonstrations.

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Search
advancedSearch.description: Quickly find philosophical concepts and mathematical theorems.

community.title: Learning Community
community.description: Connect with other students and teachers passionate about philosophy and mathematics.

mobileAccess.title: Mobile Access
mobileAccess.description: Consult resources from any device, at any time.

cta.title: Begin your philosophical journey
cta.description: Join thousands of students and educators using Riobaldo to deepen their understanding of philosophy and mathematics.
